ATLAS

Settings

Configure your review experience. Changes are saved locally.

Back to cases
Appearance
Theme preference is saved and applied immediately.
Active theme: unknown
Workflow
Defaults for reviewing queues and decisions.
J/K navigate, A approve, R reject, I request info.
Used when decision notes are required for high risk.
Settings overview
Current settings stored in local storage.
  • theme: Theme: system / light / dark
  • keyboardShortcuts: Enable J/K navigation + action hotkeys
  • defaultInboxTab: Default inbox tab on load
  • defaultRiskFilter: Default risk filter (ALL / ROUTINE / ESCALATE / BLOCK)
  • previewBehavior: Preview opens on click or auto on selection
  • previewPosition: Preview display position
  • decisionRequiresNote: Require decision notes for risk thresholds
  • highRiskThreshold: Numeric threshold for high risk
  • autoRefreshInterval: Auto-refresh interval for inbox
